name: search_for_a_word_in_quran
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool al_quran.
Tool description: Quickly retrieve original Arabic text, translation, transliteration and Word Search from the Koran /Quran
API description: Looks for a given keyword (English) in ***translation_eng*** key in the entire Koran and responds with all the verses containing the given keyword and toal matches in JSON

searchterm.description: Any given keyword or phrase you like to search for in the Koran
